alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 8:04PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Camden, southwestern Glynn, southeastern Brantley and northeastern Charlton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 804 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waverly, or 8 miles north of Woodbine, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Woodbine, Nahunta, Dock Junction, Waverly, Thalmann, Raybon, Waynesville, Atkinson and Tarboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Northeastern Charlton
